name: ligh' collision
description:
Simulating of some Atom structure.
Open world, bird fly game.

Controlers:

qweasd + Right click mouse button to navigate

Shift + controllers to speed up

mouse wheel up/ down to boost velocity

Music by Prod. Riddiman
